Action.author: vijaypunugubati
Action.body: This CR is to fix the issue I observed in the pull binaries script, with using the source command what ever the target we are executing (pull-binaries, pull-binaries-fabric, pull-binaries-fabric-ca) it’s pulling the both fabric and fabric-ca binaries and without source execution the pull binaries targets are working as expected, even if we execute the pull binaries with or without source command, there won’t be any effect on the PATH.
